data.title: Second Friday Artwalk
data.text:
St Paul's participates regularly in the "Artwalk", which is held on the second friday of every month in the evening hours.  This church is open for viewing and also displays art from a featured artist in the lounge area.  St Paul's also hosts a musical concert series (which I have not attended yet, but plan to sometime).

Dont miss the special stained glass windows by the famous "Tiffany" Studios.
